daily_plan_req: Klaus Mueller goes to the library at Oak Hill College at 9:10 AM, spends his days coding and debug, and goes to the Hobbs Cafe at 9:20 AM.
name: Klaus Mueller
learned: Klaus Mueller is a student and a coder at Oak Hill College studying software engineering. He is passionate about coding and loves to explore new things.
currently: Klaus Mueller is coding for an open-source project on a front-end framework. He submits the new version to Maria Lopez at 9:30 AM every day and face to face communicates for a while at cafe customer seating which lasts 5 minutes and face to face communicates with Isabella Rodriguez at 10 AM which lasts 10 minutes at Hobbs Cafe behind the cafe counter. lifestyle: Klaus Mueller goes to bed around 11 PM, wakes up around 7 AM, and eats dinner around 5 PM.
